page.title: 11Communications
page.content:
{(British Telecom)}operates Britain's telephone, telecomunication and Telex network. Through this system 7,276 private subscribers in Harborough can telephone directly to most parts of the world in seconds. The cost of a 3 minute local call from one of the 25 public telephone boxes is 10p. {(Royal Mail:)}There are 28 pillar boxes in Market Harborough which are emptied twice a day. 38 postmen deliver 20,000 letters daily. For this they use 19 bicyles, 8 vans and two larger vans. A 50g letter (First Class) costs 17p to post and should arrive in 1-2 days.
